title: #242: Profiling Bill Cosby, Part 6
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa are joined one final time by award winning journalist, author and host of Chasing Cosby, Nicki Weisensee Egan.


We discuss the behind the scenes of the last few days of Bill Cosby's trial, Andrea Constand's foundation www.hopehealing.ca the guilty conviction and the Chasing Cosby live event in Los Angeles in February 2020.


#VictimsMatter

#SexuallyViolentPredator


THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS

And during Pacifica Family Pricing, Chrysler has expanded their relationship with No Kid Hungry; for every Pacifica sold, Chrysler will provide up to 500 meals to kids in need. Visit chrysler.com for more details.
